brewery.brewery_description:
In 2014, Sam Richardson, Matt Monahan and Andrew Burman founded Other Half Brewing Company, a local brewery in New York City with a simple mission: to create beers that they wanted to drink from a company that they wanted to be a part of.

Their vision was to build a passionate team that brewed great beers in the state of New York—done so with effort and thoughtfulness—to represent the “Other Half” of the industry.

Today, Other Half craft beers in their Brooklyn brewery and are dedicated to collaborating with breweries both in New York as well as across the world in an effort to constantly move the industry forward while elevating the craft.

The Other Half team believes that local breweries play an important role in their communities which is why they partner with these other likeminded brewers and brands in local nabes across the country and the world—but always return to their home state of New York and their Brooklyn taproom.

beer.beer_description: You know those people, always doing successful things while the rest of us just do occasional things that look slightly better than failure. We can drink to their un-ending success with this imperial IPA jammed with Nelson Sauvin, Motueka and Superdelic, which I guess we can count as a success. Hope for the rest of us yet.
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

items.badge_description: When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 465 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 94!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 415 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 84!

beer.beer_description: Brewed with Citra, Citra Cryo, Nectaron and Riwaka giving big rich peach and tropical fruit notes.
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

beer.beer_description: We've teamed up with our friends at Brewery Ommegang to release a pair of collaboration IPA's, Neon Gleam brewed by them and Neon Broccoli brewed by our team. Neon Broccoli is a top notch variation in our Broccoli series hopped aggressively with our hand selected Citra, Citra Incognito, Mosaic, Nectaron, Strata and Nelson Sauvin.
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 405 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 82!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 225 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 46!

beer.beer_description: Tall Kiwi is hopped with some our favorite hops, Citra, Nectaron and Riwaka. This IPA is kicking off big tropical notes like lychee, sweet pineapple, passion fruit and some sweet peach
Our pals at New Trail teamed up with us to make this Keystone State inspired video game... err... Imperial IPA packed with our hand selected Cashmere, Galaxy, Centennial and Anchovy.
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 83)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 84!

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 55 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 12!

beer.beer_description: Our standard All Citra Everything double dry hopped with an extra dose of Citra lupulin powder.
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

beer.beer_description: Knockout Juice is packed with some of our favorite and juiciest hops to strike that knockout pallette blow. Citra, Citra Cryo, Citra Incognito, Galaxy, Anchovy and HBC1019.
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

items.checkin_comment: Just as delicious and stupidly drinkable as I remember it.

beer.beer_description: Brewed with lots of wheat, oats, Strata, Nelson Sauvin, Mosaic and Simcoe. We then hit it again with second dose of all those hops plus Simcoe and Mosaic lupulin powder.

user.bio: Still looking for versions of Löwenbräu from around the world. America has none!

beer.beer_description: We took our Space Diamonds base across the Tasman Sea from Austrailia to New Zealand and swapped Galaxy for our hand selected Nectaron from our friends at MacHops in Motueka, New Zealand. Lots of peachy, pineapple-y goodness with some tropical fruit candies and just enough dankness to remind you that you are drinking an IPA.
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

user.bio: “nothing picks me up like a beer can”

Lots of peachy, pineapple-y goodness with some tropical fruit candies and just enough dankness to remind you that you are drinking an IPA.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 220 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 45!

user.bio: If ya smelllalalalalalalaow, what the Meat, is cookin'!  WOOOOOOOOOO!!!!

beer.beer_description: Our next logical step is to make this bourbon BA imperial stout conditioned on a blend of raw and toasted coconut and Cloud Cover Coffee Honduras Pacayal Las Flores Natalie Pineda Coffee
Our classic Broccoli recipe with Mosaic, Simcoe, Hallertau Blanc and then we swapped the Cascade for a ton of Galaxy.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 100 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 21!

beer.beer_description: Galaxy layered with oats and milk sugar. Soft and tropical.
Galaxy layered with oats and milk sugar. Soft and tropical.
Our hand selected, super pineapple forward Simcoe with the creamy oats and lactose treatment. Double Dry Hopped with Simcoe Cryo.
Oat IPA with Citra, Centennial, and Simcoe.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: Our standard All Citra Everything double dry hopped with an extra dose of Citra lupulin powder.
Brewed with lots of wheat, oats, Strata, Nelson Sauvin, Mosaic and Simcoe. We then hit it again with second dose of all those hops plus Simcoe and Mosaic lupulin powder.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: Our standard Mylar Bags which is hopped with Amarillo, Galaxy, Citra, Mosaic and El Dorado and crushes it with Citra and Mosaic lupulin powders and more Galaxy.
Our highly hopped, low ABV crusher brewed with Mosaic, Cashmere and Citra and then double dry-hopped with even more Citra and Mosaic for full flavor in a small package.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: Our Galaxy hopped Imperial IPA double dry hopped with a massive dose of more Galaxy.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: Our classic Mosaic focused Imperial IPA containing our hand selected Mosaic, Mosaic Cryo and Mosaic Incognito. Notes of blueberry, mango and orange.
Double Citra Daydream is an Imperial Oat Cream IPA loaded with Citra and Citra Cryo like it’s going out of style.
One of the Other Half Classics that started it all. Double dry-hopped with Galaxy and Amarillo
IPA brewed with Citra, Centennial, and Simcoe.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: Double Mosaic Daydream is an Oat Cream Imperial IPA similar to Double Mosaic Dream, but brewed with oats and lactose sugar. Mosaic at it's juiciest and creamiest.

Triple Cream is a Triple Dry Hopped Imperial Oat Cream IPA. It's an even bigger version of Cheddar Imperial IPA brewed with lactose and tons of oats! We then hopped it with Wai-iti, Kohatu, Ekuanot, and Citra. This was followed by a triple dry hopping, including an all Galaxy hop final dry hop and tons of Citra lupulin powder in the second dry hop.
Oats, a hint of milk sugar and tons of Citra combine to make Citra hop candy.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: An OG Other Half DIPA stacked with our selected Citra, Citra Cryo, Mosaic, Mosaic Cryo and El Dorado.

A classic west coast style IPA hopped with Centennial, Simcoe, Cascade and Chinook. Slightly more malt character than our usual IPA's to balance out the pine and citrus character from the classic west coast hops on display. One of our most OG offerings.
Hopped with our hand selected Simcoe which has a juicy pineapple kick to it. Then we double dry hop it with Simcoe Cryo.
Oh… is our crushable wheat and oat IPA with Citra, Citra Lupulin, Galaxy and Motueka.
The first beer ever made in our own facilities, this Other Half classic is brewed with Citra and Amarillo that was dry hopped with a double dose of the same.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: Brewed with with 2-row, wheat, and oats. Crushed with Citra, Galaxy, and Nelson hops and a little milk sugar.
Galaxy layered with oats and milk sugar. Soft and tropical.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: Cabbage is hopped with Simcoe, Mosaic, Vic Secret and Motueka. A double dry hop addition makes this an explosively hoppy DIPA.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: Just your usual dairy-free cheese-less beer with a blend of Citra, Ekuanot, Kohatu and Wai-iti on a base of 2-row, oats and wheat.
An aluminum green capsule of good times with Amarillo and our hand-selected Motueka, Citra and Mosaic.
Mosaic Dream is a smaller version of our Double Mosaic Dream. This beer is solely hopped with Mosaic.
Ain't Nothing Nice is an IPA hopped with Simcoe, Galaxy and Mosaic then dry hopped a second time with Galaxy pellets and Mosaic lupulin powder.
